title: HELP!!!!
body: I can't log in to the game. It worked 12 hours ago but now it won't....  It shows invalid username/password combination, but I typed right username and password. 100% sure. I think someone hacked account

replies.body: If someone else got into your account, don't worry because we can help!  Just to be sure, though, first make sure you're in the correct region for your account on the patcher.  If you're still having any issues, just hit us up in an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account recovery team will help.  Hang tight and we'll get back to you asap!
